動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克豬萎縮性鼻炎、巴斯德桿菌不活化混合菌苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
ingredients: AT LEAST 70.10^9 CFU OF TOXIGENIC STRAINS OF PASTEURELLAMULTOCIDA (SEROTYPE A AND D) AND 75.10^9 CFU OF TOXIGENICSTRIAN OF BORDETELLA BRONCHISEPTICA. ALL ANTIGEN FRACTIONSARE INACTIVATED AND ADSORBED ON ALUMINIUM HYDROXIDE.
